    • Method Detail

      • addBuilding

        public void addBuilding(java.lang.String buildingName,
                        int buildingStatus,
                        java.lang.String buildingCalName,
                        java.lang.String buildingCalUrl,
                        int adminID,
                        java.lang.String buildingQRName)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method takes the new building's info and stores it in the building table
        Parameters:
        buildingName - name of the building
        buildingStatus - 0 for offline, 1 for online
        buildingCalName - name of the calendar
        buildingCalUrl - URL of the google calendar feed
        adminID - the table record ID of the admin
        buildingQRName - the QR name of the building
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - exception if no results are found or something is wrong with the query or connection

      • inBuildingTable

        public boolean inBuildingTable(java.lang.String buildingName)
        This method will take the building's name and check to see if a building with this name already exists
        Parameters:
        buildingName - to check
        Returns:
        true if a building w/ this name is in the building table, else false if it is not
